course_description: The class will question the extent to which current food systems are socially desirable and environmentally sustainable and explore tools, theories, and interventions to envision and create food systems that are sustainable, resilient, and just.
schedule_location: MW 2:30pm-3:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 225 (36 Eagle Ro
